title: God's Grace in Every Season

scripture.tokPisin: Mipela i kisim bel isi long God long bilip bilong Jisas Krais.
scripture.english: We have peace with God through our faith in Jesus Christ.

devotionalText: God i save givim bel isi long yumi long olgeta taim. Em i stap wantaim yumi long olgeta samting.
devotionalTextEnglish: God gives us peace in every season. He is with us through everything.

title: Setbek na Strong

scripture.tokPisin: Nogat, mi bai helpim yu long strong bilong mi yet. Strong bilong mi i kamap klia taim yu no gat strong.
scripture.english: My grace is sufficient for you, for My power is made perfect in weakness.

devotionalText: Taim yumi i pundaun, God i kirapim yumi. Em i mekim setbek i kamap rot bilong strong.
devotionalTextEnglish: When we fall, God lifts us. He turns setbacks into pathways of strength.

title: Nupela Stat

scripture.tokPisin: Lukim! Mi wok long mekim wanpela nupela samting. Nau em i kamap pinis. Yu no lukim?
scripture.english: See, I am doing a new thing! Now it springs up; do you not perceive it?

devotionalText: God i save kirapim nupela rot long laip bilong yumi. Em i rausim ol paspela hevi na bringim nupela bel isi.
devotionalTextEnglish: God begins new paths in our lives. He clears away old burdens and brings fresh peace.
